author: Techlore
description:
Tired of Firefox's recent changes? Or just looking for a more private and customizable browsing experience? In this video, we dive into the top 8 Firefox alternatives, handpicked by the community!

Take back control of your online history with Redact.dev, the tool that lets you automate the deletion of your posts and messages across major platforms, all while archiving your data locally. Use Code TECHLORE10 for a discount: https://redact.dev/techlore

We'll cover both Firefox-based browsers like LibreWolf, Zen Browser, Mullvad Browser, and Tor Browser, and non-Firefox options such as Vivaldi, Ladybird, Orion, and Brave. We'll evaluate each browser based on:

- Open Source status
- User-first design
- Privacy and security features
- Customization options
- Community values

My Kagi Review: https://youtu.be/MqDc07GCDFY
How to be private on a budget: https://youtu.be/hQkKdXZiVj4

00:00 What makes a Firefox Alt?
00:54 LibreWolf
02:22 Zen Browser
04:15 Mullvad Browser
06:40 Tor Browser
07
title: 8 Must-Try Alternatives to Firefox
